resources.string: You\'ve successfully signed in with Facebook. Click the button below to sync your Facebook eventsResponse with your local calendar now.
Something went wrong, please try logging in again.
In order to sync your Facebook events with your local calendar, we need permission to access your accounts and contacts. You can set these permissions in your app info.
In order to sync your Facebook events with your local calendar, we need permission to access your calendar. You can set these permissions in your app info.
